Dog air mail delivery: Dogs would take on the task of delivering mail and packages, becoming the fastest and most efficient delivery service.
Dog search and rescue: Dogs would be equipped with advanced flying gear, allowing them to reach remote areas and help locate missing persons or lost objects.
Dog firefighting: Dogs would use their flying abilities to access hard-to-reach fires and help extinguish them more quickly.
Dog police patrol: Police departments would use flying dogs to patrol the skies and monitor criminal activity from above.
Dog news reporting: Dogs would become journalists, flying to the scene of breaking news stories and providing live, aerial footage to news networks.
